test.name: Usuário deve conseguir acessar a seção de indicar para amigos através da seção de descubra mais ao scrollar o app para todo para baixo

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias | | strict_ssl | No | allows you to send commands to an invalid certificate host like a self-signed one. |

kw.name: Quando acesso a página inicial do Aplicativo
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: E scrollo para baixo até o final do app
Swipe By Percent
kw.doc: Swipe from one percent of the screen to another percent, for an optional duration. Normal swipe fails to scale for different screen resolutions, this can be avoided using percent.

kw.name: Swipe By Percent
kw.doc: Swipe from one percent of the screen to another percent, for an optional duration. Normal swipe fails to scale for different screen resolutions, this can be avoided using percent.

kw.name: E clico na funcionalidade de indicar amigos
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.view.View[@content-desc="Indique seus amigos Mostre aos seus amigos como é fácil ter uma vida sem burocracia."]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` is visible.

kw.name: Swipe By Percent
kw.doc: Swipe from one percent of the screen to another percent, for an optional duration. Normal swipe fails to scale for different screen resolutions, this can be avoided using percent.

kw.name: Então devo ver as informações sobre a funcionalidade de indicação e amigos
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.msg: xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@content-desc="INDICAR AMIGOS"] xpath criteria: //android.widget.Button[@content-desc="INDICAR AMIGOS"]
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//android.widget.ImageView[contains(@content-desc,"Resgate seus amigos da fila do banco")]'.
xpath criteria: //android.widget.ImageView[contains(@content-desc,"Resgate seus amigos da fila do banco")]
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `locator` element.

kw.name: Get Element Content Desc
Get Element Attribute
kw.msg: Keyword 'Get Element Attribute' found both from a custom library 'AppiumLibrary' and a standard library 'XML'. The custom keyword is used. To select explicitly, and to get rid of this warning, use either 'AppiumLibrary.Get Element Attribute' or 'XML.Get Element Attribute'.

Element 'xpath=//android.widget.ImageView[contains(@content-desc,"Resgate seus amigos da fila do banco")]' attribute 'content-desc' value 'Resgate seus amigos da fila do banco Para cada indicação aceita, um amigo salvo da burocracia'
xpath criteria: //android.widget.ImageView[contains(@content-desc,"Resgate seus amigos da fila do banco")]

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.arg: Para cada indicação aceita, um amigo salvo da burocracia
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

errors.msg: Keyword 'Get Element Attribute' found both from a custom library 'AppiumLibrary' and a standard library 'XML'. The custom keyword is used. To select explicitly, and to get rid of this warning, use either 'AppiumLibrary.Get Element Attribute' or 'XML.Get Element Attribute'.
